summary: A dashcam view of a street scene with moving traffic and pedestrians. The scene culminates with a pedestrian falling in front of the dashcam vehicle.
actions: Vehicles moving in traffic lanes, dashcam vehicle appears to be stopped or moving slowly, pedestrians are present on the sidewalk/roadside, one pedestrian falls in front of the vehicle.
characters: White van, silver sedan, white SUV (parked), male pedestrian, female pedestrian (in red), dashcam vehicle.
key_objects: Road, traffic lanes, buildings, trees, parked vehicles, pedestrians, building entrance/exit.
key_actions: Pedestrian falling in front of the vehicle; no ghost probing detected as no vehicle suddenly appeared from a blind spot and aggressively cut into traffic.
next_action: Pedestrian getting up, potential interaction between the vehicle and the pedestrians.
